listings.title: Silver IKEA Floor Lamp
listings.description: Floor lamp features a sleek, silver design with a curved arm and a round base. It has a focused light, perfect for reading or creating ambiance. The lamp is in good working condition and ready to brighten up your space. It has a simple on/off switch on the cord. Reason for sale: moving Includes bulb Pickup in Sheung Wan

listings.title: Portable Electric Space Heater
listings.description: Portable electric space heater is a compact and efficient way to warm up a room. It features two control knobs on top and a black front panel. The heater has a rectangular design and includes a power cord with a UK plug. Reason for sale: moving Dimensions: approximately 35 cm in height and 19 cm in width Pickup in Sheung Wan

listings.title: Arima HM-82 Hand Mixer
listings.description: Arima HM-82 hand mixer with original box and attachments. The mixer is white and pink. Includes the beaters. Perfect for baking and mixing ingredients. Used but fully functional. Pickup in Sheung Wan. Original price: unknown

listings.title: Click & Grow Smart Garden (9 pod system)
listings.description: Indoor garden system is perfect for growing herbs and vegetables indoors. It features a built-in LED grow light and a self-watering system. It's a great way to have fresh produce year-round. The system is compact and designed for easy use. Reason for sale: moving Well used but fully functional Original price: USD 250 (2000 HKD) Pickup in Sheung Wan

listings.title: Set of 6 Champagne Flutes (Stölzle Lausitz Germany)
listings.description: Elegant set of six German manufactured champagne flutes. These glasses feature a tall, slender design and are of high quality. Perfect for special occasions or adding a touch of sophistication to your table setting. Original price: 42 Euros Condition: Barely used Pickup in Sheung Wan Volume: 190 mL Weight: 116 g Height: 219 mm Diameter: 65 mm Reason for sale: moving.

listings.title: IKEA Globe Lamp (FADO)
listings.description: Globe lamp provides a soft, ambient light. It has a round, white shade and a base. The lamp has a power cord with a plug and an on/off switch. It is suitable for use as a bedside lamp or for creating a cozy atmosphere in any room. Original price: HKD 149.9 Condition: Like new Article Number: 100.963.75 Pickup in Sheung Wan Reason for sale: moving.

listings.title: IKEA VIMLE headrest Gunnared medium grey AP
listings.description: Adjustable headrest is upholstered in a dark grey fabric. It features a rectangular cushion supported by a metal frame. The headrest is designed to provide support and comfort. Original price: HKD 399 Condition: Good Article Number:59258309 Pickup in Sheung Wan

listings.title: Geometric Copper Pendant Light
listings.description: Stylish pendant light featuring a geometric copper frame design. Includes three pendant lights with decorative hanging ornaments. The light fixtures have a black ceiling plate. The bulbs are not included. Perfect for adding a modern touch to any space. Selling due to moving. Condition: Very good Original price: HKD 2400 Pickup in Sheung Wan

reasoningLog.title: Plan follow-up for heater conversation

Objective: check heater chat for buyer reply since last message; send follow-up if none.

2. Review conversation history to confirm no new buyer reply after our Central MTR proposal.

4. Log follow-up schedule if needed and update agent log.
